notFoundDesc: The informed CNPJ was not found in the database
invalidCnpjDesc: Please check if the CNPJ was typed correctly
networkErrorDesc: Check your internet connection and try again
serverErrorDesc: An internal error occurred. Try again in a few minutes
rateLimitErrorDesc: You made too many queries. Wait a few minutes before trying again
unknownErrorDesc: An unexpected error occurred. Try again
offlineErrorDesc: You are offline. Some features may not be available
exportErrorDesc: Could not export data. Try again
